to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_unitary:
/-- The change-of-basis matrix between two orthonormal bases `a`, `b` is a unitary matrix. -/
theorem orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_unitary : a.to_basis.to_matrix b ‚àà matrix.unitary_group Œπ ùïú :=
  by
  rw [matrix.mem_unitary_group_iff']
  ext (i j)
  convert a.repr.inner_map_map (b i) (b j)
  rw [orthonormal_iff_ite.mp b.orthonormal i j]
  rfl
#align
  orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_unitary orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_unitary

/-- The change-of-basis matrix between two orthonormal bases `a`, `b` is an orthogonal matrix. -/
theorem orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_orthogonal :
    a.to_basis.to_matrix b ‚àà matrix.orthogonal_group Œπ (expr‚Ñù) :=
  a.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_unitary b
#align
  orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_orthogonal orthonormal_basis.to_matrix_orthonormal_basis_mem_orthogonal

/-- The basis constructed in `orthogonal_family.subordinate_orthonormal_basis` is subordinate to
the `orthogonal_family` in question. -/
theorem direct_sum.is_internal.subordinate_orthonormal_basis_subordinate (a : fin n)
    (hV' : @orthogonal_family ùïú _ _ _ _ (fun i => V i) _ fun i => (V i).subtype‚Çó·µ¢) :
    hV.subordinate_orthonormal_basis hn hV' a ‚àà V (hV.subordinate_orthonormal_basis_index hn a hV') := by
  simpa only [direct_sum.is_internal.subordinate_orthonormal_basis, orthonormal_basis.coe_reindex,
    direct_sum.is_internal.subordinate_orthonormal_basis_index] using
    hV.collected_orthonormal_basis_mem hV' (fun i => std_orthonormal_basis ùïú (V i))
      ((hV.sigma_orthonormal_basis_index_equiv hn hV').symm a)

/-- An orthonormal basis of `‚Ñù` is made either of the vector `1`, or of the vector `-1`. -/
theorem orthonormal_basis_one_dim (b : orthonormal_basis Œπ (expr‚Ñù) (expr‚Ñù)) :
    (¬´expr‚áë ¬ª b = fun _ => (1 : expr‚Ñù)) ‚à® ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª b = fun _ => (-1 : expr‚Ñù) :=
  by
  have : unique Œπ := b.to_basis.unique

    rwa [real.norm_eq_abs, abs_eq (zero_le_one : (0 : expr‚Ñù) ‚â§ 1)] at this
  rw [eq_const_of_unique b]
  refine' this.imp _ _ <;> simp

/-
 If `Œπ` is a finite type and each space `f i`, `i : Œπ`, is an inner product space,
then `Œ† i, f i` is an inner product space as well. Since `Œ† i, f i` is endowed with the sup norm,
we use instead `pi_Lp 2 f` for the product space, which is endowed with the `L^2` norm.
-/
@[simp]
theorem pi_Lp.inner_apply {Œπ : Type _} [fintype Œπ] {f : Œπ ‚Üí Type _} [‚àÄ i, inner_product_space ùïú (f i)]
    (x y : pi_Lp 2 f) :
    ¬´expr‚ü™ , ‚ü´¬ª x y =
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        (¬´expr‚ü™ , ‚ü´¬ª (x i) (y i)) :=
  rfl
#align pi_Lp.inner_apply pi_Lp.inner_apply

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çó·µ¢[ ] ¬ª -/
-- Build an isometry from S·óÆ to L(S)·óÆ through euclidean_space
-- Project onto S and S·óÆ
-- Build a linear map from the isometries on S and S·óÆ
-- Prove that M is an isometry
-- Apply M to the orthogonal decomposition of x
-- Mx_decomp is the orthogonal decomposition of M x
-- Apply the Pythagorean theorem and simplify
theorem linear_isometry.extend_apply (L : ¬´expr ‚Üí‚Çó·µ¢[ ] ¬ª S ùïú V) (s : S) : L.extend s = L s :=
  by
  haveI : complete_space S := finite_dimensional.complete ùïú S
  simp only [linear_isometry.extend, continuous_linear_map.to_linear_map_eq_coe, ‚Üê linear_isometry.coe_to_linear_map]
  simp only [add_right_eq_self, linear_isometry.coe_to_linear_map, linear_isometry_equiv.coe_to_linear_isometry,
    linear_isometry.coe_comp, Function.comp_apply, orthogonal_projection_mem_subspace_eq_self, linear_map.coe_comp,
    continuous_linear_map.coe_coe, submodule.coe_subtype, linear_map.add_apply, submodule.coe_eq_zero,
    linear_isometry_equiv.map_eq_zero_iff, submodule.coe_subtype‚Çó·µ¢,
    orthogonal_projection_mem_subspace_orthogonal_complement_eq_zero, submodule.orthogonal_orthogonal,
    submodule.coe_mem]
#align linear_isometry.extend_apply linear_isometry.extend_apply

theorem _root_.orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension_of_card_eq {Œπ : Type _} [fintype Œπ]
    (card_Œπ : finrank ùïú E = fintype.card Œπ) {v : Œπ ‚Üí E} {s : set Œπ} (hv : orthonormal ùïú (s.restrict v)) :
    ‚àÉ b : orthonormal_basis Œπ ùïú E, ‚àÄ i ‚àà s, b i = v i :=
  by
  have hsv : injective (s.restrict v) := hv.linear_independent.injective
  have hX : orthonormal ùïú (coe : Set.range (s.restrict v) ‚Üí E) := by rwa [orthonormal_subtype_range hsv]
  obtain ‚ü®Y, b‚ÇÄ, hX, hb‚ÇÄ‚ü© := hX.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension
  have hŒπY : fintype.card Œπ = Y.card := by
    refine' card_Œπ.symm.trans _
    exact finite_dimensional.finrank_eq_card_finset_basis b‚ÇÄ.to_basis
  have hvsY : s.maps_to v Y := (s.maps_to_image v).mono_right (by rwa [‚Üê range_restrict])
  have hsv' : Set.InjOn v s := by
    rw [Set.injOn_iff_injective]
    exact hsv
  obtain ‚ü®g, hg‚ü© := hvsY.exists_equiv_extend_of_card_eq hŒπY hsv'
  use b‚ÇÄ.reindex g.symm
  intro i hi
  ¬∑ simp [hb‚ÇÄ, hg i hi]
#align
  orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension_of_card_eq orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension_of_card_eq

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr ‚âÉ ¬ª -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `¬´expr‚áë ¬ª -/
/-- In a finite-dimensional `inner_product_space`, any orthonormal subset can be extended to an
orthonormal basis. -/
theorem _root_.orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension (hv : orthonormal ùïú (coe : v ‚Üí E)) :
    ‚àÉ (u : Finset E)(b : orthonormal_basis u ùïú E), v ‚äÜ u ‚àß ¬´expr‚áë ¬ª b = coe :=
  by
  obtain ‚ü®u‚ÇÄ, hu‚ÇÄs, hu‚ÇÄ, hu‚ÇÄ_max‚ü© := exists_maximal_orthonormal hv
  rw [maximal_orthonormal_iff_orthogonal_complement_eq_bot hu‚ÇÄ] at hu‚ÇÄ_max
  have hu‚ÇÄ_finite : u‚ÇÄ.finite := hu‚ÇÄ.linear_independent.finite
  let u : Finset E := hu‚ÇÄ_finite.to_finset
  let fu : ¬´expr ‚âÉ ¬ª (¬´expr‚Ü• ¬ª u) (¬´expr‚Ü• ¬ª u‚ÇÄ) := equiv.cast (congr_arg coe_sort hu‚ÇÄ_finite.coe_to_finset)
  have hfu : (coe : u ‚Üí E) = (coe : u‚ÇÄ ‚Üí E) ‚àò fu := by
    ext
    simp
  have hu : orthonormal ùïú (coe : u ‚Üí E) := by simpa [hfu] using hu‚ÇÄ.comp _ fu.injective
  refine' ‚ü®u, orthonormal_basis.mk_of_orthogonal_eq_bot hu _, _, _‚ü©
  ¬∑ simpa using hu‚ÇÄ_max
  ¬∑ simpa using hu‚ÇÄs
  ¬∑ simp
#align orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension orthonormal.exists_orthonormal_basis_extension

  let ‚ü®w, hw, hw', hw''‚ü© := (orthonormal_empty ùïú E).exists_orthonormal_basis_extension

theorem orthonormal_basis.det_to_matrix_orthonormal_basis : ¬´expr‚Äñ ‚Äñ¬ª (a.to_basis.det b) = 1 :=
